name: LITTLE HOUSE ON THE PRARIE
description:
Beautiful, soft to the touch fabrics. Unique one of a kind fabric.

Tara is a sweet flowy dress. The top front section has two snaps and the bottom half of the dress is 3 large sections of horizontal sections, measuring 3.5 inches each. Colors are Brown & cream.

Washing Directions: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low or line dry. Iron as needed. For best results, turn inside out prior to washing.

SHIPPING: Shipping is priority or first class (2-3) days. Once payment is received, items with be shipped within 72 hours.

SIZING: Available in size 2 years, 3years, 5/6, & 7/8.

name: BOASTFUL IN BLUE
description:
Beautiful, soft to the touch fabrics.

Unique one of a kind fabric. The cut of this dress is very traditional and has a mature feel, so could be worn to special occasions, yet the print is fun and has a retro feel to it.

Francesca is such a special dress. It hangs long and has a great top with tie and side button. The top that ties is a inch wide band (collar) that goes all the way around and then you can tie it loosely or in a bow. A-line body and the base of the dress has a 1 inch ruffle. Colors are a very pretty blue, white and black. The floral print has a tropical yet modern feel to it.

Washing Directions: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low or line dry. Iron as needed. For best results, turn inside out prior to washing.

SHIPPING: Shipping is priority or first class (2-3) days. Once payment is received, items with be shipped within 72 hours.

SIZING: Available in size 3years, & 5/6.

name: I LOVE HOLLY HOBBY
description:
Beautiful, soft to the touch fabrics. Unique one of a kind fabric.

Ginger is our BEST SELLER. The top has an adorable unique to Slings and Baby Things layered style that mom's are drawn to! This diagonal color is made up for three layers of fabric. We've carefully placed the fabric in alternating prints. The design has a retro yet modern feel to it.

Washing Directions: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low or line dry. Iron as needed. For best results, turn inside out prior to washing.

SHIPPING: Shipping is priority or first class (2-3) days. Once payment is received, items with be shipped within 72 hours.

SIZING: Available in size 3years, 5/6, 7/8,& 9/10.

name: GARDEN GIRL PICKING FLOWERS
description:
Beautiful, soft to the touch fabrics. Unique one of a kind fabric.

Sabrina has a sweet orange collar with 2 tone button, cap sleeves with non-invasive elastic. A-line fit. Colors are teal, burgundy, cream, bright yellow, light orange, pink, mint green, & brown.

Washing Directions: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low or line dry. Iron as needed. For best results, turn inside out prior to washing.

SHIPPING: Shipping is priority or first class (2-3) days. Once payment is received, items with be shipped within 72 hours.

SIZING: Available in size 3years, 5/6, 7/8, & 9/10.

name: PRETTY IN PINK PRINT
description:
Beautiful, soft to the touch fabrics. Unique one of a kind fabric.

Penelope is a dress made up of adorable proportions. The top front section is made up of 4 squares and then the bottom half of the dress is 3 sections of horizontal flowy sections. The straps are bunched and will allow your little to grow. The back has a zipper. Colors are Mauve, taupe, cream and black. The floral print has a retro yet modern feel to it.

Washing Directions: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low or line dry. Iron as needed. For best results, turn inside out prior to washing.

SHIPPING: Shipping is priority or first class (2-3) days. Once payment is received, items with be shipped within 72 hours.

SIZING: Available in size 3years, 5/6, & 7/8.
